name: Pesto Pizza
description: Pesto pizza is a colorful (and delicious!) twist on a typical red-sauce pizza. Accentuate pesto\'s bright, bold flavors with a few slices of juicy tomatoes, or customize the pie with any of your favorite pizza toppings.
recipeIngredient: 1 recipe Basic Pizza Crust or 1 pound prepared pizza dough

recipeInstructions.name: Prebake the pizza dough
recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 400Â°F. Press the dough to fit a greased 14-inch pizza pan. Pinch the edges to form a rim. Bake the dough until the edges are lightly browned, 10 to 12 minutes.

recipeInstructions.name: Add the pizza toppings
recipeInstructions.text: Spread the pesto over the crust.

recipeInstructions.name: Then, sprinkle it with mozzarella, and top the cheese with tomato slices and pepper.
Bake the pesto pizza
recipeInstructions.text: On a lower oven rack, bake the pizza until it is heated through and the crust is golden brown, 10 to 12 minutes. Let the pizza stand 10 minutes before serving. If desired, garnish with fresh basil.

video.name: Pesto Pizza
video.description: Check out this video for how to make Pesto Pizza
